name: Crunch-Nado
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours!

Have you ever wanted to be a tornado? Well, now you can! 

Spin out of control as you try to tame this wild and unruly beast!

It's a race against the clock as you dare to obliterate everything that dares stand in your way!

Collect Power Ups along the way to help you regain some strength and speed! Don't let anything stand in your way!

Do you have what it takes to destroy it all? Lets find out!
